description: Misinterpretation of a romantic question with a literal answer
title: Heart's Desire
n_1: On a park bench, Julia turns to Mark with a curious smile.
c1_1: What brings us to these philosophical questions?
c2_1: Just curious what your heart desires!
n_2: Mark ponders deeply, missing the romantic cue.
c1_2: Well, primarily it wants blood and oxygen.
n_3: Julia looks baffled, Mark explains further.
c1_3: And don’t forget the neural messages!
n_4: They both laugh at his literal take.
c1_4: Guess I’m more practical than romantic!
c2_4: Apparently, that was the wrong answer!
